TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDispatchMessageFormatter

summary.span: 定義方法，這些方法會在服務應用程式中將要求訊息還原序列化，並將回應訊息序列化。

span.span: Defines methods that deserialize request messages and serialize response messages in a service application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 介面來建立格式器擴充功能，便可在服務應用程式中控制由參數成為訊息的序列化，以及由訊息成為參數的還原序列化。Implement the interface to create a formatter extension that controls the serialization of parameters into a message and the deserialization from a message into parameters in a service application. 若要將自訂格式器插入至服務應用程式，請使用行為將 物件指派給 屬性。To insert the custom formatter into the service application, assign the object to the property using a behavior. ## Examples 如需完整範例，請參閱[作業格式器和作業選取器](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector.md)。For a complete example, see [Operation Formatter and Operation Selector](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeserializeRequest (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message, object[] parameters);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeserializeRequest(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message, object[] parameters) cil managed

param.name: parameters
param.span: 當做參數傳遞給作業的物件。

span.span: The objects that are passed to the operation as parameters.

summary.span: 將訊息還原序列化到參數陣列中。

span.span: Deserializes a message into an array of parameters.

remarks.format: ## Examples 如需完整範例，請參閱[作業格式器和作業選取器](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector.md)。For a complete example, see [Operation Formatter and Operation Selector](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector.md).

summary.span: 從指定的訊息版本、參數陣列和傳回值來序列化回覆訊息。

span.span: Serializes a reply message from a specified message version, array of parameters, and a return value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 如需完整範例，請參閱[作業格式器和作業選取器](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector.md)。For a complete example, see [Operation Formatter and Operation Selector](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector.md).
